SELECT la.lecture_approval_no approvalEmployeeNo , la.lecture_approval_title title , e.employee_name writer , la.create_date createDate FROM lecture_approval la LEFT OUTER JOIN employee e ON la.lecturer = e.employee_no LEFT OUTER JOIN common c1 ON la.lecture_approval_status = c1.`code` LEFT OUTER JOIN approval_employee ae ON ae.lecture_approval_no = la.lecture_approval_no WHERE la.use_yn = 1 AND ae.approver = #{employeeNo} AND la.lecture_approval_status = 'AS001' AND la.lecture_approval_step = ae.approval_level
UNION ALL
SELECT aa.attendance_approval_no approvalEmployeeNo , aa.attendance_approval_title title , e.employee_name writer , aa.create_date createDate FROM attendance_approval aa LEFT OUTER JOIN employee e ON aa.employee_no = e.employee_no LEFT OUTER JOIN common c1 ON aa.attendance_approval_type = c1.`code` LEFT OUTER JOIN common c2 ON aa.attendance_approval_status = c2.`code` LEFT OUTER JOIN approval_employee ae ON ae.attendance_approval_no = aa.attendance_approval_no WHERE aa.use_yn = 1 AND ae.approver = #{employeeNo} AND aa.attendance_approval_status = 'AS001' AND aa.attendance_approval_step = ae.approval_level
ORDER BY createDate DESC LIMIT 5
